name: Gres-Tough | Kajaria
description: Gres-Tough by Kajaria combines durability and style with a matte finish, ideal for high-traffic areas. Made from vitrified tiles, it offers excellent slip resistance, scratch, and stain resistance, ensuring long-lasting beauty. Available in earthy tones, these tiles blend seamlessly with modern and traditional interiors, perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, and offices.

name: Solitaire | Kajaria
description: Solitaire by Kajaria adds luxury with its glossy finish and intricate European-inspired patterns. Crafted from premium vitrified tiles, it ensures durability and easy maintenance, making it ideal for dining areas, hallways, and commercial spaces. The rich colors and reflective surface create a spacious, elegant look.

name: Digital | Kajaria
description: Digital by Kajaria features high-definition digital printing for vibrant, realistic designs. These glossy vitrified tiles offer a range of patterns, from stone effects to abstract styles, perfect for retail stores, showrooms, and modern homes. They resist wear, stains, and moisture, ensuring lasting beauty with easy maintenance.

name: Sandune | Kajaria
description: Sandune by Kajaria mimics natural sand dunes with its textured surface, ideal for outdoor patios, terraces, and balconies. Made from vitrified tiles, it offers excellent slip resistance and durability against weather and heavy use. Available in natural tones, it creates a serene, inviting outdoor space.

name: Double-Charged | Kajaria
suitablefor: Heavy Traffic Areas, Commercial Kitchens, Warehouses
description: Double-Charged by Kajaria is built for heavy-duty use in commercial kitchens, warehouses, and high-traffic areas. These vitrified tiles feature a double-layered construction for superior durability, resisting scratches and stains. The matte finish provides grip, while neutral tones suit various industrial aesthetics.

name: HD | Kajaria
